website_summaries.verdict: Based on the live-action film, this plush Boots is the cutest, softest, and sturdiest toy of Dora’s simian best friend available.
pros: Features a sweet smile that will cheer up your kiddo
cons: No talking, motion, or singing bonus features

customer_reviews.title: Boots!
customer_reviews.text: This didn't come in the pictured packaging (just a sealed bag) but it still seems authentic and our 4 year old daughter won't let it out of her grasp. This was the first reasonably priced Boots doll we found and it's great.
customer_reviews.author: The Warden Family

customer_reviews.title: Original Box
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. My only problem or concern was it did not come in the box that is shown. It came in a seal plastic bag. The item itself was in perfect condition. Other than that my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: TheGoodWife

customer_reviews.text: Only bad thing I have to say about this adorable monkey is, his feet dont bend. Lol constant sitting pose. Other than that it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter's costume.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter went as Dora from the new movie for Halloween so this version of Boots was a "must have". It was everything she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: C.Pinon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. She dressed up as Dora for her second birthday. High quality which made it worth the money and it’s big
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this toy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter as a Christmas gift and she absolutely loves it! Sleeps with it each night and always tries to take it with us when we leave the house. Really good quality and nice material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as described. No packaging or tags.
customer_reviews.text: The plush just comes in a plastic bag with NO packaging and NO tags. I bought it as a gift and it is NOT as pictured. I'll be returning it. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter has a new favorite stuffed animal. She loves this one.
customer_reviews.author: P. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Boots
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughter and my 2 year old grandson both adore Boots. It is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Judith George

customer_reviews.title: Is this used??? WTH
customer_reviews.text: The monkey came in a plastic bag... it has a hole in the bottom under its tail. Super disappointed as my daughter saw me open it and fell in love with it so now I can’t send it back. 🤷🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - May Be A Return
customer_reviews.text: I received "Boots" timely, however he arrived in a bag, not the cardboard display box as shown in the picture. I was planning on giving this as a gift, but since it did not come in the cardboard display box and does not have a tag indicating that it is a new item, I will not be able to.
customer_reviews.author: Jean from RI

customer_reviews.title: Even cuter in person!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a Dora fan, they will love this guy! Adorable, soft and a very big size!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new best friend. Great deal for the money. Did come smelling like Lysol so I wouldn’t buy as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa brown

customer_reviews.title: Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Well she has Tico and Backpack and map....had to get her Boots! She is now in full Dora mode!
customer_reviews.author: Maria t.

customer_reviews.title: Loving this cute monkey!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’s so soft. It makes me feel special for having a stuff animal that is seen in a movie.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the Cash
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. My 2 year old daughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie Tedrow

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn’t come as advertised on package!
customer_reviews.text: It is so cute but sadly it doesn’t come like they are advertising it the package was very poor to me it just came out wrapped on a bag and inside the Amazon box ... I loved it tho the monkey is adorable my daughter loved it and it ended up working out perfect for a last minute costume on Halloween she got a way to many compliment for her and her monkey 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Strange boots but a great price for the mew Dora movie
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Dora and boots but this not a look like boots at all it's a weird little boots but bought for daughter and as long as she s,isles that is all that matters
customer_reviews.author: Melinda mckenzie

product_meta.title: Nickelodeon's Dora and the Lost City of Gold: Boots
product_meta.description: Bring home the adventure of Nickelodeon's Dora and the Lost City of Gold with the Dora the Explorer boots Plush. Made with super-soft fabric, boots is perfect for snuggling or for taking along on adventures. He wears his signature shiny red boots and is ready to explore! Kids will love reenacting their favorite scenes from the movie or making up adventures of their own! Ages 3+
feature_bullets: Bring home the adventure of Nickelodeon's Dora and the Lost City of Gold with the Dora the Explorer boots plush
Boots is made with Super soft fabric
Boots is wearing his signature shiny red boots
Perfect for snuggling and taking along on adventures

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars94 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
